# React Coding Standards

**Auto-Generated**: 2025-12-31

## Framework

- **Framework**: React
- **Version**: 19.2.0

## CSS Methodology

- **Tool**: tailwindcss
- **Description**: Tailwind CSS (utility-first)

## Bundler

- **Tool**: Next.js (webpack/turbopack)
- **Version**: 16.0.7

## Routing

- **Library**: Next.js App Router

## Component Conventions

- **Naming**: PascalCase
- **File Extension**: .tsx
- **Structure**: `components/{ComponentName}/{ComponentName}.tsx`

## Hooks / Composables

- **Enabled**: Yes
- **Custom Hook Pattern**: `use{Name}`
